related_questions.question:
27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

See you at the next answer

Pawuuu

related_questions.question:
For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

Maaf kalau ada yang salah dalam penyampaian kata²nya, apabila ada yang salah dalam jawabannya bisa dikoreksi yaa, semoga membantu ! <3

—Miranthi P.

related_questions.question:
Change these Reported Speech into Direct Speech    1. She said she had never seen a comet.

 2. They said it had been a wonderful time.

 3. My father asked me who I played with.

 4. He told us he was going to do judo

 5. He told me he had to help his father.

 Change the Direct Speech into Reported Speech

 1. Mum asked : "Have you got the keys?"

 2. He said ; "You should listen to the teacher."

 3. The police : "Don't park here!"

 4. Susan : "Who has drunk the water?"

 5. They asked : "Why didn't you play with us?"

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Reported to Direct:

1. "I had never seen a comet," she said.

2. "It has been a wonderful time," they said.

3. My father asked me, "Who did you play with?"

4. "I'm going to do judo," he told us.

5. He said, "I have to help my father"

Direct to Reported:

1. My mum asked me if I got the keys.

2. He told me that I should listen to the teacher.

3. The police said to not park here.

4. Susan asked who had drunk the water.

5. They asked me why I didn't play with them.

related_questions.question:
Tuliskan manfaat air yang ditemukan ditempat tempat berikut!    A. Tanah
B. Sumur
C. Laut 
D. Sungai​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Air Tanah berfungsi Memenuhi berbagai keperluan rumah tangga, seperti mandi, memasak, minum, dan mencuci. Irigasi pertanian, pada sawah petani yang letaknya jauh dari sumber air seperti pada sungai umumnya kemudian akan membuat sumur bor untuk mencukupi berbagai kebutuhan air tanaman pertanian.

B. fungsi air sumur

1. Meminimalisir Genangan Air Hujan

2. mengurangi risiko banjir

3. menambah cadangan air tanah

Penjelasan:

maaf cuma segini, selebihnya cari di google ya kak

related_questions.question:
24. Della : "James, I need one hundred more bed    shield and pillow cases of any color. Can
you deliver them this week?”
James : "Sure but the price is increasing about
10%. Will you still make an order?”
Della : "If that's so, I have to tell this to my
boss. I'll give you a call after lunch."
What is the woman going to do?
A. Talk to her boss.
B. Cancel the order.
C. Buy the pillow.
D. Ask for a discount.
E. Look for another supplier.​

Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep

Penjelasan:

di atas jawapin ya

Baca paragraf di bawah ini.

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi
